title: Fallout Season 2 Is Ahead of Schedule - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.18.24
description:
Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!

Tim and Andy talk about Fallout Season 2, Spligate 2 being announced, and SEGA fighting against harassment.

Today after, KFGD, you’re getting a DIABLO day:
After this, at 11 am Joey, Greg, and Xanth from the Diablo Podcast are live reacting to the Diablo IV Spiritborn class reveal!
Immediately after that at noon, Rod Fergusson is in the building for a Diablo Gamescast with Greg and Xanth.
And after that, Rod, Greg, Joey, and Xanth are streaming Diablo for your amusement!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member: Today’s Gregway is about how all this Diablo stuff happened!
Thanks for making our dreams a reality Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs, & Delaney Twining

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:24 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:30 - Fallout Season 2 Is Ahead of Schedule, Blair Marnell @ GameSpot
00:28:30 - Splitgate 2 Announced!
00:34:35 - You Can Stream Xbox Games on GeForce Now, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:38:00 - Inside Out 2 Beats Mario! Rahul Malhotra @ Collider
00:42:20 - SEGA Going After People Who Harass SEGA Employees, Amber V @ Automaton Media
00:46:24 - Wee News!
00:51:56 - SuperChats
00:54:09 - You‘re Wrong
